text: Gumazir dapanir kam aremeghamin dughiamɨn gɨn, gumazamiziba uamategh uan arazir ghuribar amuam. Men arazir kuraba, men faragha ghuezir darazir arazir kurabagh afiragham. Me asebar gɨntɨgha dar ziaba fa uan teviba apɨri. Me bar uan arazir kurar kaba ko akam batozir arazibar gɨn mangasa bar gavgafi, egha da ataghɨraghan aghua.
